title: Mobile Microlearning Program for Enhancing Professional Competencies of Surgical Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of surgical practice, foundational medical ethics
context.additional_context: Digital-based professional education program conducted in collaboration with medical education institutions.

learning_goals: Students can enhance their ability to resolve professional ethical dilemmas through scenario-based learning
Students can evaluate leadership competencies by analyzing role-modeling case studies
Students can achieve over 80% participation rates in case-based discussions
Students can demonstrate the application of professional codes of conduct in project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
